title: Redis
description: Redis is an in-memory data structure store used as a database, cache, and message broker.

snippets.Basic Commands:
# Start Redis CLI
redis-cli

# Connect to specific host/port
redis-cli -h hostname -p 6379

# Ping server
PING

# Select database
SELECT 1

# Clear database
FLUSHDB

# Clear all databases
FLUSHALL
snippets.Strings:
# Set value
SET key "value"

# Get value
GET key

# Set with expiration (seconds)
SETEX key 60 "value"

# Set if not exists
SETNX key "value"

# Increment
INCR counter
INCRBY counter 5

# Decrement
DECR counter
DECRBY counter 3
snippets.Lists:
# Push to list
LPUSH mylist "item1"
RPUSH mylist "item2"

# Pop from list
LPOP mylist
RPOP mylist

# Get range
LRANGE mylist 0 -1

# Get length
LLEN mylist

# Get by index
LINDEX mylist 0
snippets.Sets:
# Add to set
SADD myset "member1"
SADD myset "member2"

# Get all members
SMEMBERS myset

# Check membership
SISMEMBER myset "member1"

# Remove member
SREM myset "member1"

# Set operations
SUNION set1 set2
SINTER set1 set2
SDIFF set1 set2
snippets.Hashes:
# Set hash field
HSET user:1 name "John"
HSET user:1 age 30

# Get hash field
HGET user:1 name

# Get all fields
HGETALL user:1

# Set multiple fields
HMSET user:1 name "John" age 30 email "john@example.com"

# Delete field
HDEL user:1 age
snippets.Sorted Sets:
# Add to sorted set
ZADD leaderboard 100 "player1"
ZADD leaderboard 200 "player2"

# Get range by rank
ZRANGE leaderboard 0 -1
ZRANGE leaderboard 0 -1 WITHSCORES

# Get range by score
ZRANGEBYSCORE leaderboard 100 200

# Get rank
ZRANK leaderboard "player1"

# Increment score
ZINCRBY leaderboard 10 "player1"
snippets.Keys:
# Get all keys
KEYS *
KEYS user:*

# Check if key exists
EXISTS key

# Delete key
DEL key

# Set expiration
EXPIRE key 60

# Get TTL
TTL key

# Rename key
RENAME oldkey newkey
snippets.Pub/Sub:
# Subscribe to channel
SUBSCRIBE channel1

# Publish message
PUBLISH channel1 "message"

# Pattern subscribe
PSUBSCRIBE news:*

# Unsubscribe
UNSUBSCRIBE channel1
